preAuthNotice: Your payment method will be pre-authorized for the first 15 minutes.
coachNotAvailable: This coach is not available for a live session right now.

summaryOfYourSession: Here is a summary of your session.
takeawaysPlaceholder: What did you learn? What are your next steps?
notesArePrivate: These notes are private and only visible to you.
confirmEndSessionDesc: Are you sure you want to end the current live session? You will be billed for the time elapsed.
coachUnavailable: {{coachName}} is not available right now. Please try again later.
coachNoResponse: {{coachName}} did not respond in time. They may be busy.
incomingRequestDescription: A client is requesting an immediate live session.
declineMessageSubtitle: Let the client know why you're unavailable.
requestModalDescription: Confirm the details to start a live session.
authExplanation: Your payment method will be pre-authorized. You will only be billed for the actual duration of the session.
quickRepliesMessages: Sorry, I'm just finishing up. Please try again in 5 minutes.

authorizeSessionDescription: Please confirm your payment method to start the session. Your card will be pre-authorized for the first 15 minutes.
error.notConnected: Not connected to the server. Please try again.

reviewAndRespond: Please review the requests and respond.

waitingForParticipant: Waiting for the other person to join...
